abilities.desc: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
abilities.name: Nature's Grasp

abilities.desc: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.
abilities.name: Leech Seed

abilities.desc: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.
abilities.name: Living Armor

abilities.desc: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.
abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.notes: If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.

abilities.desc: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn\'t taken damage for 3 seconds. While active, Treant gains bonus movement speed.
abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.notes: While affected by Nature's Guise, Treant can move unobstructed through other trees.

abilities.desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.notes: Works on Spell Immune units, but if units gain spell immunity after the effect starts, they'll break free.
